## Description {#details}

An example GC which attempts to be compatible with Erlang/OTP garbage collector.

The frametable emitter is in <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/erlanggcprinter-cpp">ErlangGCPrinter.cpp</a>.

Definition at line 27 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp">BuiltinGCs.cpp</a>.
